ABOUT_COM.END: Join the Halal Weekend family and let us be your trusted companion on your football travel adventure. Together, we'll create lasting memories while you cheer on your team in the UK.
ABOUT_COM.FIRST_OFFER_DESCRIPTION: Stay up to date with schedules, ticket availability, and stadium details for all major football games in the UK.
ABOUT_COM.FIRST_PARA: Welcome to Halal Weekend, your go-to application for families traveling from abroad and also families living in the UK to watch live Premier league games. We're here to make your trip seamless, unforgettable and halal!
ABOUT_COM.SECOND_OFFER_DESCRIPTION: Access hotel options, transportation recommendations, and local services to ensure a comfortable stay.
ABOUT_COM.SECOND_PARA: At Halal Weekend, we understand the excitement and challenges of supporting your favorite football team in a foreign country. Our dedicated team of travel enthusiasts and local experts is committed to providing you with the essential information and resources you need.
ABOUT_COM.THIRD_OFFER_DESCRIPTION: Discover the best attractions, restaurants, masaajid and entertainment near the stadiums to make the most of your time in the UK.

LOGIN_COM.FILL ALL: Please fill all the inputs properly

CONTACT_COM.PARAGRAPH: Welcome to Halal Weekend! We're here to assist you. If you have any questions, need support, or have feedback, please don't hesitate to contact us.
